Unseen Things

An independent production company based in The New Forest, Hampshire

This is an umbrella company for projects led by James Carney across theatre, film, television, audio, and other art forms. It was created in order to produce the live audio-drama podcast The Unseen Hour, and to develop scripts. It now also encompasses a small business in mask- and puppet-making - False Faces

Associated Projects

False Faces

Grotesque and expressive masks for stage, street, and ritual.

Finding Folklore

A folk storytelling podcast uncovering hidden histories.

Punch & Judy

Traditional puppet theatre with a dark, historical edge.

The Owle Schreame Theatre Company

Rogue classical theatre and performance research.

New Forest Clown Lab

Physical theatre training rooted in Lecoq and landscape.

New Forest Cultural Council

Building artistic, folkloric, and civic life in the New Forest.

The Unseen Hour

Absurd audio horror-comedy live and in podcast form.
